text:
@realDonaldTrump YOU DISPLAY YR OWN PSYCHOLOGICAL ILLNESS on Twitter...U hide in a bunker like a baby...U gas law abiding Americans...& we mourn. - AND YOU THROW RALLIES

Still Mourning,

Families of 122,406 DEAD AMERICANS STILL DEAD OF COVID-19 

.@SenateGOP .@parscale .@HouseDemocrats
